meanings.definition: A person or group that competes against others.
meanings.sent1: In the race, my competitors were fast runners.
meanings.sent2: The competitors in the spelling bee were all very skilled.
meanings.sent3: At the pizza eating contest, my competitors were no match for my appetite!
meanings.sent4: In the jungle of business, competitors are like lions fighting for the same prey.
meanings.sent5: The competitors in the dance competition moved gracefully across the stage.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that offers similar products or services as another.
meanings.sent1: The two tech companies were fierce competitors in the market.
meanings.sent2: Local bakeries often see each other as competitors for customers.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream shop next door always tries to outdo us - they're our competitors!
meanings.sent4: In the world of smartphones, competitors are always trying to innovate and stay ahead.
meanings.sent5: The competitors in the fashion industry constantly strive to create new trends.
